law.catch_line: At the time a consumer applies through a facilitator for a refund anticipation loan, the facilitator...

text.section: The annual percentage rate for a refund anticipation loan shall be calculated using the guidelines established under the federal Truth in Lending Act.

Before completing a refund anticipation loan or refund anticipation check transaction, a facilitator shall provide to a consumer, in a form that can be retained by the consumer, the following:
The disclosures required by this section;
A copy of the completed refund anticipation loan or refund anticipation check application and agreement; and
For a refund anticipation loan, the disclosures required by the federal Truth in Lending Act.
The disclosures required by this section shall be provided in English and in the language primarily used for oral communication between the facilitator and the consumer.
